website_summaries.verdict: Standing 4 feet high, this dummy can withstand hard hits from kids.
pros: Designed for high performance skills and longtime usage
Features reinforced straps and two heavy-duty handles
Made of high-quality material that absorbs hits and teaches at the same time
cons: This dummy is best for athletes under the age of 12

customer_reviews.title: The Goalrilla Tackling Dummy has been a great tool for my sons
customer_reviews.text: The Goalrilla Tackling Dummy has been a great tool for my sons, who are 10 and 8, to learn their tackling drills. The height and weight of the product seem to work well for their intended use. Although the product may be light that is what makes it very easy for them to move it to different locations, along with the heavy duty straps. Also, the material was obviously well thought of and is constructed very well. It has been able to take on heavy contact . I feel that this product would be good for a child up to 100 or so pounds. Anyone larger would need something a little heavier. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frosh football
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough about this bag. It's light and tough. the boys love to tee off on it and clobber each other through it. It made a big difference for my boy during Freshman football season. The day we got this bag, we spent an hour in the back yard working on tackling technique. We did that every day for three days straight, and then he got plugged in during the game and became the starting corner for the rest of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness Techno GeekTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great training dummy for football
customer_reviews.text: My son is ten and plays little league football. This is a perfect training tool for blocking and tackling. I have seen some complain about the weight but most tackling dummies aren't heavy. Don't get these confused with punching bags because its not designed like that. I played ball all the way through high school and we never had real heavy dummies. This is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe-O

customer_reviews.title: much better product than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: much better product than I was expecting, bought for my son so that we could practice outside of his pop warner practices. He loves hitting it and it has held up well so far. We have used it for one season, so will have to wait and see durability over time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: A little about myself, I have coached football from youth to the high school level for 8 years and played many years before that. This bag is not professional grade but it seems like it will last many many years using it around the yard. My eleven year old son has not only been training at the house with it for football he also likes to just beat the crap out of it. For the price I don't think it can be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure he would recommend it people and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 year old brother who is a linebacker on his high school football team. He LOVES it! He is always in the yard practicing his tackles and taking out his aggression on the dummy. I'm sure he would recommend it people and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dummy
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. Packaging was good but it was "heavier" than I expected from the reviews, which is good. I coach grades 3 thru 5. This is perfect for their size. Three handles. Kids did good tonight hitting it. I rarely write reviews but this is a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to spend quality time with son teaching Rugby/Seahawks tackling. We ran through several drills with the Goalrilla. His confidence in tackling improved quickly. He went from an apprehensive tackler to an aggressive tackler in a very short time. He finished the season leading the defense on tackles. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No issues so far and good delivery from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 11 year old son for Christmas 2018, he calls it his "tackle buddy" and as the name says, he enjoys tackling it while simulating football plays. It's held up well so far (no cuts or splits). Good delivery from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: im_beach_comber

customer_reviews.title: Goalrilla
customer_reviews.text: This is just what my son needed to practice football drills at home. It is well made and very durable. He and my husband spend hours practicing together during football season and it a great tool and so far it has held up well. Great product in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, affordable tackling dummy
customer_reviews.text: This tackling dummy can handle everything my 9 year old center tackle deals out! Good construction, durable, no rips, tears or filling leaking out to date. Planning to purchase another. Will update my review if anything changes.

customer_reviews.text: Great for training before and during the season. Lighter than expected but made of very durable material. Definitely would recommend for youth football.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and serves it's purpose!
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's first year in football so I felt I better get him used to hitting things. This tackling dummy is made very well and can take the hits. I use this combined with a speed ladder and a 16x26 shield for drills in the backyard.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your growing football star
customer_reviews.text: A must have for anyone raising a football star. Light weight and well built for rugged play. Son's game has stepped up a notch. If you want some extra playing time at home or your are a coach these are the bees knees.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. No need to buy more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. No need to buy more expensive ones. These seem to be just as well built as all the rest.

customer_reviews.title: He and my husband have found it to be perfect for working on his tackling/hitting in the off season
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 8yr old son's birthday. He LOVES it! He and my husband have found it to be perfect for working on his tackling/hitting in the off season. It's not very heavy, but for that age, it doesn't need to be.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This Goalrilla Tackling Dummy is wonderful. It's very lightweight and easy for my son to use. He is 9 years old and just beginning to enjoy football. This was the perfect gift for him to learn the proper technigue to tackle. He is truly enjoying this, and the best part is it came very quickly! One important comment if this is a gift-it does come in a clear plastic bag so if you plan to hide it make sure you are looking for it.

customer_reviews.title: Cancer causing???
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the size, shape, and apparent durability... BUT I'm a little concerned about the sticker that says 'chemicals in this product are considered cancer-causing in the sate of California'... What's that all about?!?

product_meta.title: Goalrilla Durable Tackling Dummy with Heavy-Duty Handles for Football Contact Drills, Kickboxing, and More
product_meta.description: The Goalrilla Tackling Dummy is designed to take the toughest abuse and provide better control during contact drills. It features three reinforced heavy-duty handles for long-lasting performance and a secure hold. Perfect for football, soccer, basketball, kickboxing, mixed martial arts and military training, this tackling dummy can help increase athlete strength and stamina, and offers a safer alternative to contact drills. The Goalrilla Tackling Dummy is the perfect training tool for athletes at all skill levels and measures 50.5” high with a 14.4” diameter, and weighs 8.8 lbs. Since 1927, Escalade Sports has taken pride in manufacturing quality products. With a fully-staffed customer service team, we are committed to providing courteous care and a 100% guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE TACKLING DUMMY - Durable Tackling Dummy for Football, Basketball, Kickboxing, Martial Arts, and More
GREAT FOR CONTACT DRILLS - Superior Control and Durability for Contact Drills, and Offers a Safer Alternative
HANDLES PROVIDE IMPROVED CONTROL - Three Reinforced, Heavy-Duty Handles For Improved Control
THICK, DENSE FOAM - Inner Material: 50.6 lbs/Cubic Meter High Density Foam, Dummy Measures 50.5” High, 14.4” Diameter, Weighs 8.8 lbs

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Since 1927, Escalade Sports has taken pride in manufacturing quality products. With a fully-staffed customer service team, we are committed to providing courteous care and a 100% guarantee you will be satisfied with your purchase
